entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
